song_name: Death Death Devil Devil Devil Devil Evil Evil Song
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Death Death Devil Devil Devil Devil Evil Evil Song is more basic than the typical song, having below average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Death Death Devil Devil Devil Devil Evil Evil Song is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music. 

See the C Major Cheat Sheet for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
